LMEGetType

Gets the LME type as a string from the LME object.

Synopsis

#include "slepclme.h" 
PetscErrorCode LMEGetType(LME lme,LMEType *type)
Not Collective

Input Parameter

lme  - the linear matrix equation context

Output Parameter

type  - name of LME method

See Also

LMESetType()

Level

intermediate

Location

src/lme/interface/lmebasic.c
